title: Oliver 3-Seater Fabric Sofa (Blue)
description: A comfortable and stylish 3-seater fabric sofa, perfect for any living room. The Oliver sofa is upholstered in high-quality blue fabric.

title: Smart LED TV Android - 32inches
description: Enjoy your favorite shows and movies on this 32-inch Smart LED TV with Android OS, offering a crisp and clear picture quality.

title: Double Door Fridge (240 Litre)
description: A spacious double door fridge with a 240-litre capacity, ideal for keeping your food fresh and organized.

title: Top Load Washing Machine
description: Efficient top load washing machine with multiple wash programs and a large capacity for all your laundry needs.

title: Aurora Wooden Queen Bed (6x5)
description: The Aurora queen bed combines comfort and style with a solid wood frame and a modern design, fitting a 6x5 mattress.

title: Induction Cooktop Full Electric
description: A compact and efficient induction cooktop with multiple preset cooking modes and energy-saving features.

title: Single Door Fridge (190 Litre)
description: Keep your food fresh with this 190-litre single door fridge, featuring superior cooling and energy-efficient technology.

title: Poise Wooden Queen Bed (6x5)
description: The Poise queen bed offers a sturdy metal frame with a solid wood headboard, ensuring durability and style for your bedroom.
